concept.description: As workspace defined folders will be treated as npm workspaces as long as they have valid package.json files inside them.
concept.cypher: MATCH (package:NPM:Package)-[rel:DECLARES_WORKSPACE]->(dir:NPM:Workspace:Directory) WHERE NOT EXISTS { MATCH (file:File:Json)-[:CONTAINS]->(dir) WHERE file.fileName ENDS WITH '/package.json' } REMOVE dir:Workspace:NPM DELETE rel RETURN dir AS NoWorkspaceDirectories
